arStrings.szText: {c_important}Stinger{/c} applies {c_number}[{SF_6}*100|%|]{/c} of its Base damage as Poisoning over {c_number}[{buffduration:POISON_DOT}]{/c} seconds to all enemies hit.

{c_important}Stinger{/c} does {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage if it only hits a single enemy. Instead of echoing to surrounding Poisoned enemies, {c_important}Stinger{/c} now draws from each to hit enemies in the primary area again for an additional {c_number}[{SF_11}*100|%|]{/c} of its Base damage, up to {c_number}{SF_20}{/c} times.

If {c_important}Stinger{/c} strikes a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy it Heals you for {c_number}[{SF_12}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([Max(1,PlayerHealthMax() * {SF_12})]){/c}. If you are {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c} it makes enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} seconds.
